titles.title: A bill to amend title 54, United States Code, to authorize the provision of technical assistance under the Preserve America Program and to direct the Secretary of the Interior to enter into partnerships with communities adjacent to units of the National Park System to leverage local cultural heritage tourism assets.
Explore America Act of 2019
Explore America Act of 2019
Explore America Act of 2019

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
